thread.title: Netflix and knitting - how Britain's Yarnold celebrated historic gold

title: Netflix and knitting - how Britain's Yarnold celebrated historic gold
text:
Netflix and knitting - how Britain's Yarnold celebrated historic gold   01:08 
Women's skeleton gold medallist Lizzy Yarnold delighted at becoming the first Briton to successfully defend a Winter Olympic title. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
